node.text:
Our Duplex Suite that looks out onto the Arabian Sea is sure to leave you spell- bound. This two-level suite at The Raviz Kovalam features a living room and private balcony on one level, and an opulent bedroom on the next.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
